title: I can't hear certain Champion's voices in-game
body:
I have been playing a lot of Ahri {{champion:103}}  lately and I have not been able to hear her charming voice at all (taunt, joke, laugh, etc.) It's not that noticeable but pretty annoying. Has anyone else been experiencing a similar problem where their champion's voices are completely muted? (I have the voice bar turned up to max in settings). I use Mac btw.

Thanks :)

replies.body:
Hey! 

I haven't seen other reports of this personally. Have you tried doing a client repair? We patch pretty often, and it's possible some files got jumbled along the way. Lemme know if that works, and if not, I can poke around and see what some other options are.

Hey! I can hear her voice now! How did u fix it? 

Awesome & Thanks ^_^

Magic.~~

Glad it's working for you! :D
